text: This is a comprehensive list of awards won by Colombian reggaeton singer J Balvin. He has won 82 awards from 327 nominations, including 8 Billboard Latin Music Awards, 4 Latin Grammy Awards, 2 MTV Video Music Awards and 4 Latin American Music Awards. He received two nominations at the Grammy Awards for "I Like It" for Record of the Year in 2019 and for his collaborative album Oasis with Bad Bunny received the nomination for Best Latin Rock, Urban or Alternative Album in 2020.
